mapper.select: SELECT T2.STPL_DSC_AMT /*약정할인금액*/ , T2.RSTL_BASE_TP_CD /*재약정기준유형코드*/ , T2.RSTL_SELL_CHNL_DV_CD /*잭약정판매채널구분코드*/ , T2.RSTL_MCN /*재약정개월수*/ , T2.MIN_RENTAL_AMT /*최소렌탈금액*/ , T2.RSTL_DUTY_MCN /*재약정의무개월수*/ , T2.RSTL_BASE_TP_CD || '(' || T2.RSTL_DUTY_MCN || '개월 ' || T2.STPL_DSC_AMT || '원 할인)-' || F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSTL_SELL_CHNL_DV_CD', T2.RSTL_SELL_CHNL_DV_CD) AS TEXT FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_RSTL_BAS T2 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T2.VL_STRT_DTM AND T2.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.SL_CL_YM = (SELECT MAX(SL_CL_YM) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND (T2.RSTL_SELL_CHNL_DV_CD = SUBSTR(T3.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD,0,2) OR T2.RSTL_SELL_CHNL_DV_CD = '00') AND T4.RENTAL_TN BETWEEN T2.RCP_STRT_MCN AND T2.RCP_END_MCN AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T2.RENTAL_TN /*현재렌탈차월*/ , T1.STPL_PTRM /*의무사용기간*/ , T1.CNTR_PTRM /*총계약기간*/ , T3.IST_DT /*설치일자*/ , T1.CNTR_PD_STRTDT /*상품시작일자*/ , TO_NUMBER(NVL(T4.STPL_TN, 0)) AS STPL_TN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.SL_CL_YM = (SELECT MAX(SL_CL_YM) FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN) INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T3 ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_RENTAL_RSTL_IZ T4 ON T4.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T4.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T4.STPL_TN = (SELECT MAX(STPL_TN) FROM TB_SSCT_RENTAL_RSTL_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , STPL_TN /* 약정회차 */ , STPL_TP_CD /* 약정유형코드 */ , STPL_PTRM_UNIT_CD /* 약정기간단위코드 */ , STPL_PTRM /* 약정기간 */ , STPL_STRTDT /* 약정시작일자 */ , STPL_ENDDT /* 약정종료일자 */ , STPL_DSC_AMT /* 약정할인금액 */ , RSTL_STAT_CD /* 재약정상태코드 */ , STPL_RCP_DTM /* 약정접수일시 */ , RCP_OG_TP_CD /* 접수조직유형코드 */ , RCP_PRTNR_NO /* 접수파트너번호 */ , FEE_ACKMT_CT /* 수수료인정건수 */ , FEE_ACKMT_BASE_AMT /* 수수료인정기준금액 */ , FEE_FXAM_YN /* 수수료정액여부 */ , ACKMT_PERF_RT /* 인정실적율 */ , ACKMT_PERF_AMT /* 인정실적금액 */ , NOTY_FW_ID /* 알림발송ID */ , STPL_CNFM_DTM /* 약정확정일시 */ , CNFM_USR_ID /* 확정사용자ID */ , CNTR_CH_FSH_DTM /* 계약변경완료일시 */ , STPL_CAN_DTM /* 약정취소일시 */ , STPL_CAN_USR_ID /* 약정취소사용자ID */ , STPL_WDWL_DTM /* 약정철회일시 */ , STPL_WDWL_USR_ID /* 약정철회사용자ID */ , STPL_WDWL_CN /* 약정철회내용 */ , STPL_DSC_STRTDT /* 약정할인시작일자 */ , STPL_DSC_ENDDT /* 약정할인종료일자 */ , STPL_DSC_ACU_AMT /* 약정할인누적금액 */ , STPL_DSC_BOR_AMT /* 약정할인위약금액 */ , DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ , FST_RGST_DTM /* 최초등록일시 */ , FST_RGST_USR_ID /* 최초등록사용자ID */ , FST_RGST_PRG_ID /* 최초등록프로그램ID */ , FST_RGST_DEPT_ID /* 최초등록부서ID */ , FNL_MDFC_DTM /* 최종수정일시 */ , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID /* 최종수정사용자ID */ , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID /* 최종수정프로그램ID */ , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID /* 최종수정부서ID */ FROM TB_SSCT_RENTAL_RSTL_IZ /* 렌탈재약정내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 계약번호 */ AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /* 계약일련번호 */
